xal.extension.fit.lsm

Class Gaussian

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.fit.lsm.Gaussian

  • public class Gaussian
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for data fitting with Gaussian function. The Gaussian function form used in this class is y = pedestal+amp*exp(-(x-center)^2/(sigma^2/2.)).
